title: Monitor won't show League
body:
When I get in game, the screen goes black and a message pops up: Input signal out of range. Change settings to 1600 x 900 -60 HZ.
This hasn't happened to me before, seems to have occurred randomly. What should I do?

replies.body: Okay, I was able to fix this. I deleted the config file in my League of Legends folder, and that did the trick.
Deleting the config files must have forced them to reset back to defaults. Make sure you've got the game set to the same resolution as your desktop and you should be fine!
